PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_FlowInstrumentTypePressureGauge
PropertySetDef.Definition: A device that reads and displays a pressure value at a point or the pressure difference between two points.

PropertyDef.Name: DisplaySize
PropertyDef.Definition: The physical size of the display. For a dial pressure gauge it will be the diameter of the dial.

PropertyDef.Name: PressureGaugeType
PropertyDef.Definition: Identifies the means by which pressure is displayed.
